text: Win Ben Stein's Money is an American television game show created by Al Burton and Donnie Brainard that aired first-run episodes from July 28, 1997 to January 31, 2003, on Comedy Central. Category:1997 American television series debuts Category:1990s American television series Category:Television quiz shows Category:Emmy Award winning programs Category:English-language television programs
title: Win Ben Stein's Money
